info.title: Masumi Payment Service API
info.description: A comprehensive payment service API for the Masumi ecosystem, providing secure payment processing, agent registry management, and wallet operations.

id.description: Unique identifier for the API key

permission.description: Permission level of the API key

usageLimited.description: Whether the API key has usage limits

networkLimit.description: List of Cardano networks this API key is allowed to access

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Use an empty string for ADA/lovelace e.g (1000000 lovelace = 1 ADA)

amount.description: The quantity of the asset. Make sure to convert it from the underlying smallest unit (in case of decimals, multiply it by the decimal factor e.g. for 1 ADA = 10000000 lovelace)

RemainingUsageCredits.description: Remaining usage credits for this API key

status.description: Current status of the API key

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the secret was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the secret was last updated

mnemonic.description: Decrypted 24-word mnemonic phrase for the wallet

Secret.description: Wallet secret (mnemonic). Only included if includeSecret is true

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the pending transaction was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the pending transaction was last updated

hash.description: Transaction hash of the pending transaction. Null if not yet submitted

lastCheckedAt.description: Timestamp when the pending transaction was last checked. Null if never checked

PendingTransaction.description: Pending transaction for this wallet. Null if no transaction is pending

note.description: Optional note about this wallet. Null if not set

walletVkey.description: Payment key hash of the wallet

collectionAddress.description: Collection address for this wallet. Null if not set

walletMnemonic.description: 24-word mnemonic phrase for the newly generated wallet. IMPORTANT: Backup this mnemonic securely

walletAddress.description: Cardano address of the newly generated wallet

walletVkey.description: Payment key hash of the newly generated wallet

id.description: Unique identifier for the payment

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the payment was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the payment was last updated

blockchainIdentifier.description: Unique blockchain identifier for the payment

agentIdentifier.description: Identifier of the agent that is being paid

lastCheckedAt.description: Timestamp when the payment was last checked on-chain. Null if never checked

payByTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) by which the buyer must submit the payment transaction. Null if not set

submitResultTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) by which the seller must submit the result

unlockTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) after which funds can be unlocked if no disputes

collateralReturnLovelace.description: Amount of collateral to return in lovelace. Null if no collateral

externalDisputeUnlockTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) after which external dispute resolution can occur

requestedById.description: ID of the API key that created this payment

resultHash.description: SHA256 hash of the result submitted by the seller (hex string)

inputHash.description: SHA256 hash of the input data for the payment (hex string)

cooldownTime.description: Cooldown period in milliseconds for the seller to dispute

cooldownTimeOtherParty.description: Cooldown period in milliseconds for the buyer to dispute

onChainState.description: Current state of the payment on the blockchain. Null if not yet on-chain

requestedAction.description: Next action required for this payment

errorType.description: Type of error that occurred, if any

errorNote.description: Additional details about the error, if any

resultHash.description: SHA256 hash of the result to be submitted (hex string). Null if not applicable

NextAction.description: Next action required for this payment

id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was last updated

previousOnChainState.description: Previous on-chain state before this transaction

newOnChainState.description: New on-chain state of this transaction

confirmations.description: Number of block confirmations for this transaction

CurrentTransaction.description: Current active transaction for this payment. Null if no transaction in progress

id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was last updated

previousOnChainState.description: Previous on-chain state before this transaction

newOnChainState.description: New on-chain state of this transaction

confirmations.description: Number of block confirmations for this transaction

TransactionHistory.description: Historical list of all transactions for this payment. Null or empty if includeHistory is false

amount.description: The quantity of the asset. Make sure to convert it from the underlying smallest unit (in case of decimals, multiply it by the decimal factor e.g. for 1 ADA = 10000000 lovelace)

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Use an empty string for ADA/lovelace e.g (1000000 lovelace = 1 ADA)

amount.description: Amount of the asset withdrawn (as string to handle large numbers)

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Empty string for ADA/lovelace

WithdrawnForSeller.description: List of assets and amounts withdrawn for the seller

amount.description: Amount of the asset withdrawn (as string to handle large numbers)

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Empty string for ADA/lovelace

WithdrawnForBuyer.description: List of assets and amounts withdrawn for the buyer (refunds)

id.description: Unique identifier for the payment source

network.description: The Cardano network (Mainnet, Preprod, or Preview)

smartContractAddress.description: Address of the smart contract managing this payment

policyId.description: Policy ID for the agent registry NFTs. Null if not applicable

PaymentSource.description: Payment source configuration for this payment

id.description: Unique identifier for the buyer wallet

walletVkey.description: Payment key hash of the buyer wallet

BuyerWallet.description: Buyer wallet information. Null if buyer has not yet submitted payment

id.description: Unique identifier for the smart contract wallet

walletVkey.description: Payment key hash of the smart contract wallet

walletAddress.description: Cardano address of the smart contract wallet

SmartContractWallet.description: Smart contract wallet (seller wallet) managing this payment. Null if not set

metadata.description: Optional metadata stored with the payment for additional context. Null if not provided

id.description: Unique identifier for the purchase

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the purchase was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the purchase was last updated

blockchainIdentifier.description: Unique blockchain identifier for the purchase

agentIdentifier.description: Identifier of the agent that is being purchased

lastCheckedAt.description: Timestamp when the purchase was last checked on-chain. Null if never checked

payByTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) by which the buyer must submit the payment transaction. Null if not set

submitResultTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) by which the seller must submit the result

unlockTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) after which funds can be unlocked if no disputes

externalDisputeUnlockTime.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) after which external dispute resolution can occur

requestedById.description: ID of the API key that created this purchase

onChainState.description: Current state of the purchase on the blockchain. Null if not yet on-chain

collateralReturnLovelace.description: Amount of collateral to return in lovelace. Null if no collateral

cooldownTime.description: Cooldown period in milliseconds for the buyer to dispute

cooldownTimeOtherParty.description: Cooldown period in milliseconds for the seller to dispute

inputHash.description: SHA256 hash of the input data for the purchase (hex string)

resultHash.description: SHA256 hash of the result submitted by the seller (hex string)

requestedAction.description: Next action required for this purchase

errorType.description: Type of error that occurred, if any

errorNote.description: Additional details about the error, if any

NextAction.description: Next action required for this purchase

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was last updated

previousOnChainState.description: Previous on-chain state before this transaction

newOnChainState.description: New on-chain state of this transaction

confirmations.description: Number of block confirmations for this transaction

CurrentTransaction.description: Current active transaction for this purchase. Null if no transaction in progress

id.description: Unique identifier for the seller wallet

walletVkey.description: Payment key hash of the seller wallet

SellerWallet.description: Seller wallet information. Null if not set

policyId.description: Policy ID of the agent registry NFT

assetName.description: Asset name of the agent registry NFT

agentIdentifier.description: Full agent identifier (policy ID + asset name)

description.description: Description of the agent. Null if not provided

apiBaseUrl.description: Base URL of the agent API for interactions

mimeType.description: MIME type of the example output (e.g., image/png, text/plain)

ExampleOutputs.description: List of example outputs from the agent

Tags.description: List of tags categorizing the agent

name.description: Name of the AI model/capability. Null if not provided

version.description: Version of the AI model/capability. Null if not provided

Capability.description: Information about the AI model and version used by the agent. Null if not provided

contactEmail.description: Contact email of the author. Null if not provided

contactOther.description: Other contact information for the author. Null if not provided

organization.description: Organization of the author. Null if not provided

privacyPolicy.description: URL to the privacy policy. Null if not provided

terms.description: URL to the terms of service. Null if not provided

other.description: Other legal information. Null if not provided

Legal.description: Legal information about the agent. Null if not provided

pricingType.description: Pricing type for the agent (Fixed or Free)

amount.description: The quantity of the asset. Make sure to convert it from the underlying smallest unit (in case of decimals, multiply it by the decimal factor e.g. for 1 ADA = 10000000 lovelace)

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Uses an empty string for ADA/lovelace e.g (1000000 lovelace = 1 ADA)

Pricing.description: List of assets and amounts for fixed pricing

pricingType.description: Pricing type for the agent (Fixed or Free)

metadataVersion.description: Version of the metadata schema (currently only version 1 is supported)

error.description: Error message if registration failed. Null if no error

id.description: Unique identifier for the registry request

description.description: Description of the agent. Null if not provided

apiBaseUrl.description: Base URL of the agent API for interactions

name.description: Name of the AI model/capability. Null if not provided

version.description: Version of the AI model/capability. Null if not provided

terms.description: URL to the terms of service. Null if not provided

other.description: Other legal information. Null if not provided

state.description: Current state of the registration process

Tags.description: List of tags categorizing the agent

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the registry request was last updated

lastCheckedAt.description: Timestamp when the registry was last checked. Null if never checked

mimeType.description: MIME type of the example output (e.g., image/png, text/plain)

ExampleOutputs.description: List of example outputs from the agent

agentIdentifier.description: Full agent identifier (policy ID + asset name). Null if not yet minted

amount.description: The quantity of the asset. Make sure to convert it from the underlying smallest unit (in case of decimals, multiply it by the decimal factor e.g. for 1 ADA = 10000000 lovelace)

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Uses an empty string for ADA/lovelace e.g (1000000 lovelace = 1 ADA)

Pricing.description: List of assets and amounts for fixed pricing

walletVkey.description: Payment key hash of the smart contract wallet

walletAddress.description: Cardano address of the smart contract wallet

SmartContractWallet.description: Smart contract wallet managing this agent registration

confirmations.description: Number of block confirmations for this transaction. Null if not yet confirmed

id.description: Unique identifier for the payment source

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the payment source was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the payment source was last updated

network.description: The Cardano network (Mainnet, Preprod, or Preview)

policyId.description: Policy ID for the agent registry NFTs. Null if not applicable

smartContractAddress.description: Address of the smart contract for this payment source

lastIdentifierChecked.description: Last agent identifier checked during registry sync. Null if not synced yet

lastCheckedAt.description: Timestamp when the registry was last synced. Null if never synced

walletAddress.description: Cardano address of the admin wallet

AdminWallets.description: List of admin wallets for dispute resolution

walletVkey.description: Payment key hash of the purchasing wallet

walletAddress.description: Cardano address of the purchasing wallet

rpcProviderApiKey.description: The RPC provider API key (e.g., Blockfrost project ID)

PaymentSourceConfig.description: RPC provider configuration for blockchain interactions

lastIdentifierChecked.description: Last agent identifier checked during registry sync. Null if not synced yet

syncInProgress.description: Whether a registry sync is currently in progress

lastCheckedAt.description: Timestamp when the registry was last synced. Null if never synced

walletAddress.description: Cardano address of the admin wallet

AdminWallets.description: List of admin wallets for dispute resolution (exactly 3 required)

id.description: Unique identifier for the purchasing wallet

walletVkey.description: Payment key hash of the purchasing wallet

walletAddress.description: Cardano address of the purchasing wallet

collectionAddress.description: Optional collection address for this wallet. Null if not set

note.description: Optional note about this wallet. Null if not set

id.description: Unique identifier for the selling wallet

walletVkey.description: Payment key hash of the selling wallet

collectionAddress.description: Optional collection address for this wallet. Null if not set

note.description: Optional note about this wallet. Null if not set

SellingWallets.description: List of wallets used for selling (seller side)

walletAddress.description: Cardano address that receives network fees

FeeReceiverNetworkWallet.description: Wallet that receives network fees from transactions

feeRatePermille.description: Fee rate in permille (per thousand). Example: 50 = 5%

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Use an empty string for ADA/lovelace e.g (1000000 lovelace = 1 ADA)

quantity.description: The quantity of the asset. Make sure to convert it from the underlying smallest unit (in case of decimals, multiply it by the decimal factor e.g. for 1 ADA = 10000000 lovelace)

Amounts.description: List of assets and amounts in this UTXO

dataHash.description: Hash of the datum attached to this UTXO. Null if no datum

inlineDatum.description: Inline datum data in CBOR hex format. Null if no inline datum

referenceScriptHash.description: Hash of the reference script attached to this UTXO. Null if no reference script

outputIndex.description: Output index of this UTXO in the transaction

block.description: Block hash where this UTXO was created

id.description: Unique identifier for the RPC provider key

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the RPC provider key was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the RPC provider key was last updated

network.description: The Cardano network this RPC provider key is for

get.summary: Get the status of the API server

200.description: Object with status ok, if the server is running

status.description: Health status of the service. Returns "ok" when the service is running

get.summary: Get information about your current API key.
Get information about a wallet. (admin access required)

schema.description: The type of wallet to query

parameters.description: The type of wallet to query
parameters.name: walletType

schema.description: The id of the wallet to query

parameters.description: The id of the wallet to query
parameters.name: id

schema.description: Whether to include the decrypted secret in the response

parameters.description: Whether to include the decrypted secret in the response
parameters.name: includeSecret

post.description: Creates a wallet, it will not be saved in the database, please ensure to remember the mnemonic
post.summary: Create a new wallet. (admin access required)

network.description: The network the Cardano wallet will be used on

id.description: The id of the wallet to update

newCollectionAddress.description: The new collection address to set for this wallet. Pass null to clear.

post.description: Verifies the reveal data signature is valid.
post.summary: Verifies the reveal data signature is valid. (read access required)

signature.description: Cryptographic signature from the admin wallet

key.description: Public key used to create the signature

walletAddress.description: Cardano address of the admin wallet signing the request

validUntil.description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) until which this signature is valid

blockchainIdentifier.description: The blockchain identifier, for which the data should be revealed

isValid.description: Whether the signature is valid and the data can be revealed

post.description: Swap ADA for CNTs (Cardano Native Tokens) or CNTs for ADA using SundaeSwap DEX. This endpoint is mainnet-only.
post.summary: Execute a token swap on SundaeSwap. (admin access required, mainnet only)

walletVkey.description: Wallet verification key (vKey) to identify the wallet

amount.description: Amount to swap (in ADA or token units)

policyId.description: Policy ID of the source token. Use empty string "" for ADA (native token)

assetName.description: Asset name of the source token. Use empty string "" for ADA

policyId.description: Policy ID of the destination token. Use empty string "" for ADA (native token)

assetName.description: Asset name of the destination token. Use empty string "" for ADA

walletAddress.description: Wallet address used for the swap

401.description: Unauthorized (invalid API key or insufficient permissions)

get.summary: Get information about all API keys. (admin access required)

schema.description: The number of API keys to return

parameters.description: The number of API keys to return
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Used to paginate through the API keys

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the API keys
parameters.name: cursorToken

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.summary: Create a new API key. (admin access required)

usageLimited.description: Whether the API key is usage limited. Meaning only allowed to use the specified credits or can freely spend

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Use an empty string for ADA/lovelace e.g (1000000 lovelace = 1 ADA)

amount.description: The quantity of the asset. Make sure to convert it from the underlying smallest unit (in case of decimals, multiply it by the decimal factor e.g. for 1 ADA = 10000000 lovelace)

UsageCredits.description: The credits allowed to be used by the API key. Only relevant if usageLimited is true.

networkLimit.description: The networks the API key is allowed to use

permission.description: The permission of the API key

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

patch.summary: Update an existing API key. (admin access required)

id.description: The id of the API key to update. Provide either id or apiKey

token.description: To change the api key token

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Use an empty string for ADA/lovelace e.g (1000000 lovelace = 1 ADA)

amount.description: The quantity of the asset. Make sure to convert it from the underlying smallest unit (in case of decimals, multiply it by the decimal factor e.g. for 1 ADA = 10000000 lovelace)

UsageCreditsToAddOrRemove.description: The amount of credits to add or remove from the API key. Only relevant if usageLimited is true.

usageLimited.description: Whether the API key is usage limited

status.description: The status of the API key

networkLimit.description: The networks the API key is allowed to use

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

delete.summary: Delete an existing API key. (admin access required)

id.description: The id of the API key to be (soft) deleted.

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

get.description: Gets the payment status. It needs to be created first with a POST request.
get.summary: Get information about a payment request. (admin access required)

schema.description: The number of payments to return

parameters.description: The number of payments to return
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Used to paginate through the payments. If this is provided, cursorId is required

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the payments. If this is provided, cursorId is required
parameters.name: cursorId

schema.description: The network the payments were made on

parameters.description: The network the payments were made on
parameters.name: network

schema.description: The smart contract address of the payment source

parameters.description: The smart contract address of the payment source
parameters.name: filterSmartContractAddress

schema.description: Whether to include the full transaction and status history of the payments

parameters.description: Whether to include the full transaction and status history of the payments
parameters.name: includeHistory

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Creates a payment request and identifier. This will check incoming payments in the background.
post.summary: Create a new payment request. (admin access required +PAY)

inputHash.description: The hash of the input data of the payment, should be sha256 hash of the input data, therefore needs to be in hex string format

network.description: The network the payment will be received on

agentIdentifier.description: The identifier of the agent that will be paid

amount.description: Amount of the asset in smallest unit (e.g., lovelace for ADA)

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Empty string for ADA/lovelace

RequestedFunds.description: The amounts of the payment, should be null for fixed amount

payByTime.description: The time after which the payment has to be submitted to the smart contract

submitResultTime.description: The time after which the payment has to be submitted to the smart contract

unlockTime.description: The time after which the payment will be unlocked

externalDisputeUnlockTime.description: The time after which the payment will be unlocked for external dispute

metadata.description: Metadata to be stored with the payment request

identifierFromPurchaser.description: The a unique nonce from the purchaser. Required to be in hex format

example.metadata: (private) metadata to be stored with the payment request

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Submit the hash of their completed job for a payment request, which triggers the fund unlock process so the seller can collect payment after the unlock time expires. (admin access required +PAY)
post.summary: Completes a payment request. This will collect the funds after the unlock time. (admin access required +PAY)

network.description: The network the payment was received on

submitResultHash.description: The hash of the AI agent result to be submitted, should be sha256 hash of the result, therefore needs to be in hex string format

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Authorizes a refund for a payment request. This will stop the right to receive a payment and initiate a refund for the other party.
post.summary: Authorizes a refund for a payment request. This will stop the right to receive a payment and initiate a refund for the other party. (admin access required +PAY)

blockchainIdentifier.description: The identifier of the purchase to be refunded

network.description: The network the Cardano wallet will be used on

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

get.description: Gets the purchase status. It needs to be created first with a POST request.
get.summary: Get information about an existing purchase request. (READ access required)

schema.description: The number of purchases to return

parameters.description: The number of purchases to return
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Used to paginate through the purchases. If this is provided, cursorId is required

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the purchases. If this is provided, cursorId is required
parameters.name: cursorId

schema.description: The network the purchases were made on

parameters.description: The network the purchases were made on
parameters.name: network

schema.description: The smart contract address of the payment source

parameters.description: The smart contract address of the payment source
parameters.name: filterSmartContractAddress

schema.description: Whether to include the full transaction and status history of the purchases

parameters.description: Whether to include the full transaction and status history of the purchases
parameters.name: includeHistory

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Creates a purchase and pays the seller. This requires funds to be available.
post.summary: Create a new purchase request and pay. (access required +PAY)

blockchainIdentifier.description: The identifier of the purchase. Is provided by the seller

network.description: The network the transaction will be made on

inputHash.description: The hash of the input data of the purchase, should be sha256 hash of the input data, therefore needs to be in hex string format

sellerVkey.description: The verification key of the seller

agentIdentifier.description: The identifier of the agent that is being purchased

amount.description: Amount of the asset in smallest unit (e.g., lovelace for ADA)

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Empty string for ADA/lovelace

Amounts.description: The amounts to be paid for the purchase

unlockTime.description: The time after which the purchase will be unlocked. In unix time (number)

externalDisputeUnlockTime.description: The time after which the purchase will be unlocked for external dispute. In unix time (number)

submitResultTime.description: The time by which the result has to be submitted. In unix time (number)

payByTime.description: The time after which the purchase has to be submitted to the smart contract

metadata.description: Metadata to be stored with the purchase request

identifierFromPurchaser.description: The nonce of the purchaser of the purchase, needs to be in hex format

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Requests a refund for a completed purchase. This will collect the refund after the refund time.
post.summary: Request a refund for a completed purchase, which will be automatically collected after the refund time period expires. (+PAY access required)

blockchainIdentifier.description: The identifier of the purchase to be refunded

network.description: The network the Cardano wallet will be used on

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Requests a refund for a completed purchase. This will collect the refund after the refund time.
post.summary: Cancel a previously requested refund for a purchase, reverting the transaction back to its normal processing state. (+PAY access required)

blockchainIdentifier.description: The identifier of the purchase to be refunded

network.description: The network the Cardano wallet will be used on

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Resolves a payment request by its blockchain identifier.
post.summary: Resolve a payment request by its blockchain identifier. (READ access required)

network.description: The network the purchases were made on

filterSmartContractAddress.description: The smart contract address of the payment source

includeHistory.description: Whether to include the full transaction and status history of the purchases

post.description: Resolves a purchase request by its blockchain identifier.

filterSmartContractAddress.description: The smart contract address of the payment source

includeHistory.description: Whether to include the full transaction and status history of the purchases

get.summary: Fetch all agents (and their full metadata) that are registered to a specified wallet. (READ access required)

schema.description: The payment key of the wallet to be queried

parameters.description: The payment key of the wallet to be queried
parameters.name: walletVKey

schema.description: The Cardano network used to register the agent on

parameters.description: The Cardano network used to register the agent on
parameters.name: network

schema.description: The smart contract address of the payment source to which the registration belongs

parameters.description: The smart contract address of the payment source to which the registration belongs
parameters.name: smartContractAddress

Assets.description: List of agent assets registered to this wallet

get.summary: List every agent that is recorded in the Masumi Registry. (READ access required)

schema.description: The cursor id to paginate through the results

parameters.description: The cursor id to paginate through the results
parameters.name: cursorId

schema.description: The Cardano network used to register the agent on

parameters.description: The Cardano network used to register the agent on
parameters.name: network

schema.description: The smart contract address of the payment source

parameters.description: The smart contract address of the payment source
parameters.name: filterSmartContractAddress

post.description: Registers an agent to the registry (Please note that while it it is put on-chain, the transaction is not yet finalized by the blockchain, as designed finality is only eventually reached. If you need certainty, please check status via the registry(GET) or if you require custom logic, the transaction directly using the txHash)
post.summary: Registers an agent to the registry (+PAY access required)

network.description: The Cardano network used to register the agent on

sellingWalletVkey.description: The payment key of a specific wallet used for the registration

mimeType.description: MIME type of the example output (e.g., image/png, text/plain)

ExampleOutputs.description: List of example outputs from the agent

Tags.description: Tags used in the registry metadata

apiBaseUrl.description: Base URL of the agent, to request interactions

Capability.description: Provide information about the used AI model and version

unit.description: Asset policy id + asset name concatenated. Uses an empty string for ADA/lovelace e.g (1000000 lovelace = 1 ADA)

amount.description: The quantity of the asset. Make sure to convert it from the underlying smallest unit (in case of decimals, multiply it by the decimal factor e.g. for 1 ADA = 10000000 lovelace)

terms.description: URL to the terms of service

contactOther.description: Other contact information for the author

delete.description: Permanently deletes an agent registration record from the database. This action is irreversible and should only be used for registrations in specific failed or completed states.
delete.summary: Delete an agent registration record. (admin access required)

id.description: The database ID of the agent registration record to be deleted.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid state for deletion

error.message: Agent registration cannot be deleted in its current state: RegistrationRequested

post.description: Deregisters a agent from the specified registry (Please note that while the command is put on-chain, the transaction is not yet finalized by the blockchain, as designed finality is only eventually reached. If you need certainty, please check status via the registry(GET) or if you require custom logic, the transaction directly using the txHash)
post.summary: Deregisters an agent from the specified registry. (admin access required +PAY)

agentIdentifier.description: The identifier of the registration (asset) to be deregistered

network.description: The network the registration was made on

smartContractAddress.description: The smart contract address of the payment contract to which the registration belongs

get.summary: List payment sources with their public details. (READ access required)

schema.description: The number of payment sources to return

parameters.description: The number of payment sources to return
parameters.name: take

schema.description: Used to paginate through the payment sources

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the payment sources
parameters.name: cursorId

get.description: Gets the payment contracts including the status.
get.summary: List payment sources with their public details augmented with internal configuration and sync status information. (admin access required)

schema.description: The number of payment sources to return

parameters.description: The number of payment sources to return
parameters.name: take

schema.description: Used to paginate through the payment sources

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the payment sources
parameters.name: cursorId

ExtendedPaymentSources.description: List of payment sources with extended details including RPC configuration

post.summary: Create a new payment source. (+ADMIN access required)

network.description: The network the payment source will be used on

rpcProviderApiKey.description: The rpc provider (blockfrost) api key to be used for the payment source

rpcProvider.description: The rpc provider to be used for the payment source

feeRatePermille.description: The fee in permille to be used for the payment source. The default contract uses 50 (5%)

cooldownTime.description: The cooldown time in milliseconds to be used for the payment source. The default contract uses 1000 * 60 * 7 (7 minutes)

walletAddress.description: Cardano address of the admin wallet

AdminWallets.description: The wallet addresses of the admin wallets (exactly 3)

walletAddress.description: Cardano address that receives network fees

FeeReceiverNetworkWallet.description: The wallet address of the network fee receiver wallet

walletMnemonic.description: 24-word mnemonic phrase for the purchasing wallet. IMPORTANT: Backup this securely

collectionAddress.description: The collection address of the purchasing wallet

PurchasingWallets.description: The mnemonic of the purchasing wallets to be added. Please backup the mnemonic of the wallets.

walletMnemonic.description: 24-word mnemonic phrase for the selling wallet

collectionAddress.description: The collection address of the selling wallet

SellingWallets.description: The mnemonic of the selling wallets to be added. Please backup the mnemonic of the wallets.

patch.summary: Update an existing payment source. (+ADMIN access required)

id.description: The id of the payment source to be updated

rpcProviderApiKey.description: The rpc provider (blockfrost) api key to be used for the payment source

rpcProvider.description: The rpc provider to be used for the payment contract

walletMnemonic.description: 24-word mnemonic phrase for the purchasing wallet. IMPORTANT: Backup this securely

collectionAddress.description: The collection address of the purchasing wallet

AddPurchasingWallets.description: The mnemonic of the purchasing wallets to be added

walletMnemonic.description: 24-word mnemonic phrase for the selling wallet

collectionAddress.description: The collection address of the selling wallet

AddSellingWallets.description: The mnemonic of the selling wallets to be added

id.description: ID of the purchasing wallet to remove

RemovePurchasingWallets.description: The ids of the purchasing wallets to be removed. Please backup the mnemonic of the old wallet before removing it.

id.description: ID of the selling wallet to remove

RemoveSellingWallets.description: The ids of the selling wallets to be removed. Please backup the mnemonic of the old wallet before removing it.

lastIdentifierChecked.description: The latest identifier of the payment source. Usually should not be changed

delete.description: Deletes a payment source. WARNING will also delete all associated wallets and transactions.
delete.summary: Delete an existing payment source. (+ADMIN access required)

id.description: The id of the payment source to be deleted

get.summary: Helper endpoint that lets you ask the payment service for the current UTXOs sitting at a particular Cardano address. (READ access required)

schema.description: The address to get the UTXOs for

parameters.description: The address to get the UTXOs for
parameters.name: address

schema.description: The Cardano network

parameters.description: The Cardano network
parameters.name: network

schema.description: The number of UTXOs to get

parameters.description: The number of UTXOs to get
parameters.name: count

schema.description: The page number to get

parameters.description: The page number to get
parameters.name: page

schema.description: The order to get the UTXOs in

parameters.description: The order to get the UTXOs in
parameters.name: order

Utxos.description: List of UTXOs for the specified address

get.description: Gets rpc api keys, currently only blockfrost is supported (internal)
get.summary: List Blockfrost API keys. (admin access required)

schema.description: Used to paginate through the rpc provider keys

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the rpc provider keys
parameters.name: cursorId

schema.description: The number of rpc provider keys to return

parameters.description: The number of rpc provider keys to return
parameters.name: limit
